body:
Does not appear to be a problem any more. See [this gist](https://gist.github.com/kokes/ec05c336d23c129afbef).

(This is regarding the first part of the issue, I presume the latter part is 'won't implement'.)

these types of things are much better done after initial parsing. For example, using 0.18.0 this is very easy to do.

```
In [56]: df = read_csv(StringIO(data),sep='\s+')

In [57]: df
Out[57]: 
  id          value
0  a    a=0,b=4,c=6
1  b  a=10,b=5,c=-1
2  c      a=20,c=60
3  d          a=430
4  e          c=200

In [58]: df.value.str.extractall("(?P<letter>[abc])=(?P<digit>\d)")
Out[58]: 
        letter digit
  match             
0 0          a     0
  1          b     4
  2          c     6
1 0          a     1
  1          b     5
2 0          a     2
  1          c     6
3 0          a     4
4 0          c     2

In [66]: df.join(df.value.str.extractall("(?P<letter>[abc])=(?P<digit>\d)").reset_index('match'))
Out[66]: 
  id          value  match letter digit
0  a    a=0,b=4,c=6      0      a     0
0  a    a=0,b=4,c=6      1      b     4
0  a    a=0,b=4,c=6      2      c     6
1  b  a=10,b=5,c=-1      0      a     1
1  b  a=10,b=5,c=-1      1      b     5
2  c      a=20,c=60      0      a     2
2  c      a=20,c=60      1      c     6
3  d          a=430      0      a     4
4  e          c=200      0      c     2
```
